name: Thunderball (itch) (clickmazes)
description:
Find a route to align the coloured balls into a neat horizontal row anywhere on the grid. Use the white blocker cells and the trailing paths for tactical blocking but beware of the electrified perimeter. Ouch!

  • Number of puzzles: 34
  • Average play time: 3h+
  • First published: October 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Inspired by: https://erich-friedman.github.io/mathmagic/0304.html
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

puzzle concept  - Jonathan Welton - 2004
puzzlescript implementation - Andrea Gilbert - 2021  
puzzle designs - Erich Friedman, Jonathan Welton, Andrea Gilbert - 2021
